name: system/Environment variables getter with fallback

a51796cd-95b6-43e6-88e8-54ae80e59646.name: variable names
a51796cd-95b6-43e6-88e8-54ae80e59646.description:
Receives a list of variable names to be resolved from the environment.

Example:
["Var1", "Var2"]

2793a39a-95ef-44bd-a075-6554a4c35d0b.name: default values

25b50086-6321-402e-82e6-8b7879683cc3.name: resolved variables
25b50086-6321-402e-82e6-8b7879683cc3.description:
Sends the dictionary of resolved environment variables as a name:value dictionary.

Contains the environment value if found, otherwise the specified default value if any.


Example:
{
  "V1": "value 1",
  "V2": "default value 2"
}

description: Gets a list variable from either the system environment by name or the provided fallback default values. Sends a dictionary with a dictionary of names that have been resolved either way.
